name: Campari Spritz
description: In Speakeasy, Jason Kosmas and Dushan Zaric of Employees Only say that Campari Spritz is the predecessor of the popular Aperol Spritz: "Whereas the Aperol version is soft, the Campari version is bold and assertive."
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Prosecco or other sparkling wine
garnish: 1 large green olive, or 3 small olives on a pick

recipeInstructions.text: Fill rocks glass with ice. Add sparkling wine, club soda, and Campari. Stir gently. Garnish with olives.
